body:
@sevaan @Osmose 

Had a good meeting with legal/policy today. Here are some answers to outstanding questions

- They would prefer the opt-out box is on the same page as other data settings. It can be a sub-check box under the basic telemetry box. Unchecking this box does not uncheck basic telemetry.

- The learn more link should go to SUMO. I can work with the SUMO team to get some documentation together.

- I need to file a legal bug to update the usage statistics section of the browser privacy notice. 

- The Shield Experiments tab does not need to be visible unless the user is eligible for AND have been picked for an experiment. Old experiments are greyed out and should remain visible to users so they can see if they have ever been a part of an experiment.

I think those were all of the outstanding questions. Let me know if I missed something.
